general_advisory: Weather conditions are suitable for the infestation of pests in crops. Ensure proper pest control measures and follow recommended practices for better agricultural yields.

advisory: Chlorothalonil 75% WP (Ishaan/ Kavach) @ 400-gram/ acre for Tikka disease control
Apply 87kg of DAP, 20kg of MOP and 4-ton of FYM at the time of planting in trenches
Collect and destroy caterpillars and egg masses for Dimond Back Moth and Head Borer control
Collect and destroy caterpillars and egg masses for Dimond Back Moth and Head Borer control
Use neem oil formulation for aphid control
Prevailing fog condition may increase the infestation of aphids
Spray Mancozeb 75% WP @600 g/acre for Early Blight disease control
Shake plants to dislodge grubs, pupae, and adults for Epilachna Beetle control
Spray neem-based pesticide (Azadirachtin) 1500 PPM @ 3-ml/litre of water
Vaccinate the chicks with Lasota at 7 days and with IBD vaccines within 13-15 days for Sleeping disease control
